content: an easy and fun toy to make for your favorite kitty the legs curl naturally and it is just the right size for mittens to toss about the room after getting a snootful of catnip which is stuffed inside the octopus s head gauge is not important and it takes only a small amount of yarn to complete using acrylic yarn is recommended as some cats have the nasty habit of chewing and eating 100% wool fibers please note this pattern is intended for individual home use only and is not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit
